name: drinaluza
description: Frontend of drinaluza. A mobile first app to manage small businesses
author: Ahmed Derbala <derbala.ahmed531992@gmail.com>

scripts.fix: rm -rf .expo && npx expo install --check && npx expo-doctor
scripts.fix:start: npm run fix&& npm run start:local
scripts.build: npm run fix && NODE_ENV=production eas build --platform android --profile production --local --output=../drinaluza.apk
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm i -g eas-cli && npm run build
scripts.clean:start: npm run clean && npm run start:local
scripts.clean: npx expo prebuild --clean && rm -rf android && rm -rf ios && rm -rf .expo && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -r -f node_modules && npm run i
scripts.update: npm run check-updates && npm run clean:start
scripts.push: npm run format && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.pull: git pull origin main && npm run i && npm run start:local
